title: Chocolate, caramel and pecan cheesecake
ingredients: ['360g vanilla biscuit crumbs', '85g unsalted butter', '400g dairy toffees, unwrapped', '150ml evaporated milk', '110g chopped pecans', '675g cream cheese', '100g caster sugar', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '2 eggs', '85g plain chocolate chips']
